md:
giải nghĩa từ "pitch" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Pitch** (noun)

* Meaning: độ cao, độ dốc, độ nghiêng
* Example: The pitch of the roof was too steep for us to climb.
* Related words: steep, slope, angle

**Pitch** (verb)

* Meaning: ném, tung, phóng
* Example: The baseball player pitched the ball to the catcher.
* Related words: throw, toss, hurl

**Pitch** (noun, in music)

* Meaning: cao độ, âm cao
* Example: The singer's pitch was perfect in the opera.
* Related words: tone, note, frequency

**Pitch** (noun, in business)

* Meaning: đề xuất, trình bày
* Example: The entrepreneur pitched her idea to the investors.
* Related words: proposal, presentation, sales talk
html:
giải nghĩa từ "pitch" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Pitch (noun)

  • Meaning: độ cao, độ dốc, độ nghiêng
  • Example: The pitch of the roof was too steep for us to climb.

Pitch (verb)

  • Example: The baseball player pitched the ball to the catcher.
  • Related words: throw, toss, hurl

Pitch (noun, in music)

  • Example: The singer's pitch was perfect in the opera.

  • Related words: proposal, presentation, sales talk
